definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: All my brothers are killing each other for the throne.
sentences.chinese: 我的兄弟们为了皇位相互杀戮。

sentences.english: The prime minister YuWenHuaJi in order to take the throne with collude with the turks.
sentences.chinese: 丞相宇文化及为了夺取皇位同突厥暗中勾结。

sentences.english: A sharp struggle centred on the succession to the throne came along with the death of emperor Tai Zong (Huang Tai Ji).
sentences.chinese: 皇太极去世后，围绕皇位继承权展开了激烈的斗争。

sentences.english: Princess Kilo's new baby boy ends Japan's debate on female succession to throne.
sentences.chinese: 日本纪子妃产子，结束女性能否继承皇位之争。

sentences.english: That is why he is the only one who has never fought for your throne.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么只有他从不争夺皇位。

sentences.english: As a result, Catherine was declared Empress of Imperial Russia.
sentences.chinese: 因此，凯萨琳娜登上了俄罗斯的皇位。

sentences.english: Tang Dynasty was at a critical period with tangled contradiction when Li Longji became the emperor .
sentences.chinese: 唐玄宗登上皇位时，正是唐朝矛盾重重的危机时刻。

sentences.english: He was hanged for plotting to supplant the king.
sentences.chinese: 他因阴谋篡夺皇位而被绞死。

sentences.english: He beats all the rivals to the throne.
sentences.chinese: 他打败所有对手，登上皇位。

sentences.english: After Liu Xun ascended the throne, he made Imperial Concubine Xu his queen.
sentences.chinese: 刘询承皇位以后，立许妃做皇后。

definition: Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
